summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the behavior of the AWS EMR client (boto3) using the Moto library to mock EMR services. It covers operations such as creating and describing clusters, managing instance groups, bootstrap actions, security configurations, tags, autoscaling policies, steps, and termination settings, ensuring the client handles various scenarios and error conditions correctly.
business_intent: To guarantee reliable integration with Amazon EMR by automatically testing cluster lifecycle management, configuration, and operational features, thereby reducing regression risk and supporting continuous delivery of data processing workloads.
